item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1438335491629{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Create collapsible and expandable blocks, perfect for a frequently asked questions and answers page for customers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1428870314847{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_toggle title="What payment methods do you accept?" style="square" color="black"]We accept the following methods of payment - Mastercard, Visa, Visa Debit and PayPal.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="When will I be charged?" style="square" color="black"]Payment is charged immediately after security checks from your bank issuer and Storesy have been authorized.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How do I know my order has been placed successfully?" style="square" color="black"]We will send you an acknowledgement email on successful completion of an order on the site. This email will detail the order that you have placed and will give you an order reference number. We would advise you to keep this email safely as you will need your order reference number for any further queries which you may have. Failure to provide us with an order reference number on request will result in a delay with your enquiry. Once your order has been accepted and dispatched to you we will send you a confirmation email.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="I did not receive a confirmation email" style="square" color="black"]Please contact us if you do not receive an acknowledgement email and we will make sure it is not a problem with our system. Acknowledgement emails are generated and sent automatically once an order has been successfully completed. You may need to check your mailbox as it may be treating our emails as spam or junk mail and you should check your spam or junk mail folders to make sure they have not gone directly to this location. You may also need to ensure that all of the details entered are correct, please pay particular attention to your payment card details, email address and delivery addresses.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="The item/size I ordered is out of stock. Why was it on the website?" style="square" color="black"]All items are subject to availability. Generally, if an item is showing on our website then it is available to order. However, during busy periods we may be in a position where we cannot supply an item or there may be an unexpected delay in dispatch. Our system does not record individual size quantities, if you order several items in the same size you may experience a slight delay. If this is the case, we will let you know as soon as possible and will offer to substitute the item for another item of similar style/colour/ size or we will offer a refund.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How long will my order take to be processed?" style="square" color="black"]We try to process orders as quickly as possible as we know how exciting it is to get your order promptly, however please allow 24 – 72 working hours as a guide.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Left Sidebar
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]After a comfortable breakfast, served in the car, Mr. Fogg and his partners had just resumed whist, when a violent whistling was heard, and the train stopped. Passepartout put his head out of the door, but saw nothing to cause the delay; no station was in view. Aouda and Fix feared that Mr. Fogg might take it into his head to get out; but that gentleman contented himself with saying to his servant, "See what is the matter."[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439996074168{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996061745{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439289418166{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"]

ELEVEN IN THE MORNING

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] At eleven in the morning the train had reached the dividing ridge of the waters at Bridger Pass, seven thousand five hundred and twenty-four feet above the level of the sea, one of the highest points attained by the track in crossing the Rocky Mountains. After going about two hundred miles, the travellers at last found themselves on one of those vast plains which extend to the Atlantic, and which nature has made so propitious for laying the iron road. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996067813{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439289433430{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"]

THE ATLANTIC BASIN

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]On the declivity of the Atlantic basin the first streams, branches of the North Platte River, already appeared. The whole northern and eastern horizon was bounded by the immense semi-circular curtain which is formed by the southern portion of the Rocky Mountains, the highest being Laramie Peak. Between this and the railway extended vast plains, plentifully irrigated. On the right rose the lower spurs of the mountainous mass which extends southward.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
The only difference between the saint and the sinner is that every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future. Oscar Wilde
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][featured_products per_page="3" columns="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was to convince the world he didn't exist.

item.title: Order Tracking
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded: [woocommerce_order_tracking]

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="full_page_width"][vc_column][cg_content_strip height="380px" width="80%" bg="#333333" animation="fadeInUp" bg_img="74727"]

Help

[/cg_content_strip][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439996358124{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996332300{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438772230204{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

WHAT IS YOUR UK RETURNS POLICY?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Do you want to return something? No problem! Returns are FREE for UK customers. You can return any item for a refund within 28 days of receiving your original order. You can also exchange your item within 28 days, as long as the new item has the same product code as the original.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996346949{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438772791962{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

WHAT IS YOUR INTERNATIONAL RETURNS POLICY?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

There's no need to let us know you're returning something, just fill it in the returns note inside your parcel and pop it back to us. We'll refund the price you paid for your item, including sale items back to your original payment method within 30 days.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439996386775{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996369298{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438772995666{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

MY ORDER HASN'T BEEN DELIVERED YET

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Your estimated delivery date is in your Order Confirmation email – please allow until this date for your order to arrive. It's also worth checking if there's any local delays in your area. You’ll be able to follow your order if it’s been sent with a trackable service. You will be able to follow the process by logging into the 'My Account' section of the site.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996376574{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438773185872{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

CAN I EXCHANGE AN ITEM?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

If the item is out of stock then a refund will be processed instead. If you want a different item, the item you want is sold under a different product code, or the item you want is a different price to the price at which you bought the original product, then you'll need to return the unwanted item for a refund and place a new order.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1441129047331{margin-bottom: 60px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;background: #f2f2f2 url(http://storesydata.commercegurus.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/1385x600.jpg?id=75119) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="no-bg-image-mobile"][vc_column width="1/2"]
[/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438776883805{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

HOW CAN I PAY FOR MY ORDER?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

You can use any of the payment types listed below to pay for your order. We take your security very seriously, therefore your details are safe with us. We also take fraud very seriously too, so all credit and debit card holders are subject to validation and authorisation by both us and the card issuer.

If there is no payment details saved to your account, then you’ll be asked to enter them when you click ‘Checkout’.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439996418391{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996401362{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438777315584{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

WILL I BE CHARGED CUSTOMS & IMPORT CHARGES?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

You may be charged for handling fees and taxes as your order passes through customs. Any charges on a parcel must be paid by the person receiving the parcel (this also applies to retail & wholesale customers). We have no control over these charges and we can’t tell you what the cost would be, as customs policies and import duties vary widely.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439996408693{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1438777382028{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

I'M MISSING AN ITEM FROM MY ORDER

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

We may have sent your items in separate parcels so please check your emails to see if any of your items will be arriving separately. If your order has been sent in different parcels then each delivery note will tell you the items you can expect to find inside. Please check the delivery notes from each part of your order to make sure you're not missing anything.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="74584" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1440152501982{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1441644152619{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1441800881345{margin-bottom: 7px !important;}"]

Highlighted Collection

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439305995554{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="75443" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1441644473523{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

Jonas Bjorkman, Sweden

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color="#000000" align="align_left" type="small" thickness="2" up="25" down="25"][vc_column_text] Bjorkman was credited by Vogue with “a sixth sense about the fashion future.” He got his start as a sketch artist for Lucile, Ltd. in 1916. Bjorkman served in World War I on the front line in Europe, staying in Paris afterward and working for Lucile, Molyneux and Poiret. [/vc_column_text][recent_products per_page="3" columns="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439295918190{margin-bottom: 55px !important;}"][vc_column][cg_logos posts="8"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="full_page_width" el_class="viewport-height" css=".vc_custom_1439568355345{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"][vc_column][cg_content_strip height="500px" width="80%" bg="#000000" animation="fadeInUp" bg_img="74721"]

About Us

Experience our journey

[/cg_content_strip][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtb3VzZSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmRpdiUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439568573688{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439572219544{margin-bottom: 7px !important;}"]

We are a global fashion destination for 20-somethings, selling cutting-edge ‘fast fashion’ and offer a wide variety of fashion-related new content.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439554253177{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

WHY WE STARTED STORESY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439997961981{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439997946333{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439554884096{padding-right: 40px !important;}"]We constantly challenge the status quo. Nothing is worse than complacency, and as a brand our culture is to dissect every single decision we make at every level of the company. We know our customers are also rule breakers and questioners, so we hope this philosophy is palpable in choices we make. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439997967871{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439561788879{padding-right: 40px !important;}"]We spend months finding the best factories around the world—the very same ones that produce your favorite designer labels. We visit them often, and build strong personal relationships with the owners. This hands-on approach is the most effective way to ensure a factory's integrity. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439568382650{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439560114872{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

WHO WE ARE

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] While the team skews young, our employees have cut their teeth at places like Google, Yelp, Gilt Groupe, American Apparel, Marc Jacobs, J.Crew, Goldman Sachs, Pentagram, and The Gap. It’s a motley group held together by a shared passion for pushing boundaries. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439563242999{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439997533918{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74707" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1439997552340{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439562934000{margin-bottom: -2px !important;}"]

JOHN BURROWS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

CEO

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439997571003{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74706" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1439997579172{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439562943254{margin-bottom: -2px !important;}"]

OLGA HORGAN

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

OPERATIONS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439997594687{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74705" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1439997586952{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439562952391{margin-bottom: -2px !important;}"]

ROGER WILLIAMS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

MARKETING

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439997617813{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74704" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1439997613450{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439562960830{margin-bottom: -2px !important;}"]

KATIE YUN

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

DESIGN

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439997623913{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74708" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1439997634265{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439562969927{margin-bottom: -2px !important;}"]

RICARDO DIAZ

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

TECHNOLOGY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439997650167{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74709" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1439997642573{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439562980034{margin-bottom: -2px !important;}"]

JENNY COOPER

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

SUPPORT

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width" css=".vc_custom_1439565124472{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator color="#e2e2e2" thickness="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="center-row" css=".vc_custom_1439565181543{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_btn title="GET IN TOUCH" style="custom" custom_background="#8d1347" custom_text="#ffffff" size="lg" link="url:%23||" el_class="custom-large-button"][vc_btn title="HELP SECTION" style="outline-custom" outline_custom_color="#8d1347" outline_custom_hover_background="#8d1347" outline_custom_hover_text="#ffffff" size="lg" link="url:%23||" el_class="custom-large-button"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439568200290{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f4f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="4/6"][vc_single_image image="74714" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]
They say you should start a business that you wish already existed, so we quit our day jobs.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439569270747{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;background-color: #f4f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439570294507{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

PRESS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439570304126{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f4f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1439997661235{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74719" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1439997694764{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text]“New online shopping site Storesy is serving up a selection of cute and classic wardrobe staples for less.” [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1439997668492{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74718" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1439997702998{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text]“I see Storesy as a resource of all trends, they're always on things before a lot of other high street stores.”[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1439997675137{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74717" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1439997710075{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text]“Constant innovation is the key that Storesy use to win favour among all types, regardless of their style.”[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1439997687080{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="74716" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1439997717065{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}" el_class="mobile-50"][vc_column_text]“The Storsey collection has cleverly edited trend stories and diversity of brands plus an impeccable delivery service”[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our Values
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="full_page_width" el_class="viewport-height" css=".vc_custom_1439568355345{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"][vc_column][cg_content_strip height="500px" width="80%" bg="#000000" animation="fadeInUp" bg_img="74764"]

Our Values

What guides us everyday

[/cg_content_strip][vc_raw_html]

JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtb3VzZSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmRpdiUzRQ==

[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1439568573688{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439648271068{margin-bottom: 7px !important;}"]

Our values were built into the core of Storesy on day one. These values guide our ship, keeping us constantly aligned with what really matters: you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439650963070{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439998980942{margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;}" el_class="margin-35-large"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-key" color="custom" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="custom" size="xl" custom_color="#8d1347" custom_background_color="#8d1347"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439650972069{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

TRUST

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We spend months finding the best factories around the world—the very same ones that produce your favorite designer labels. We visit them often, and build strong personal relationships with the owners. This hands-on approach is the most effective way to ensure a factory's integrity. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439662221144{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439998988394{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}" el_class="margin-35-large"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-like" color="custom" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="custom" size="xl" custom_color="#8d1347" custom_background_color="#8d1347"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439662030048{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

INTEGRITY

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]For us, Fashion with Integrity means managing all aspects of our brand transparently so that our customers can enjoy their fashion in the knowledge that they are not harming people, animals or the environment. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1441129121618{margin-bottom: 70px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 130px !important;background-image: url(http://storesydata.commercegurus.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/1385x600.jpg?id=75119) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"]
[/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439675574045{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"]

“ I love the digital journalism and the Storesy magazine has stunning editorials with some of my favorite emerging photographers "

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439661807145{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

KATE WALTERS, STORESY CUSTOMER

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439663924194{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439999130534{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}" el_class="margin-35-large"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-study" color="custom" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="custom" size="xl" custom_color="#8d1347" custom_background_color="#8d1347"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439662358404{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

OUR FOUNDATION

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]The Foundation will award financial grants to women in the worlds of design, fashion, music, and the arts, to help fund them on their way to becoming a boss. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439664096552{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1439999672431{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}" el_class="margin-35-large"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-location" color="custom" background_style="rounded-outline" background_color="custom" size="xl" custom_color="#8d1347" custom_background_color="#8d1347"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439662620310{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

ETHICAL TRADE

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We source garments and other goods from around the world, including China, Eastern Europe, India, Turkey and the UK, where over 85% of the factories making our products are based. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1441129139495{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-image: url(http://storesydata.commercegurus.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/1385x600.jpg?id=75119) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"]
[/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439670193795{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"]

"Storesy – the go to for anything and everything on trend and damn right cool."

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439671674062{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

MARIE CLAIRE

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1439672565891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #f4f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"]
[/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439671729025{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

HOW WE CREATED OUR 2015 COLLECTION

[/vc_column_text][vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/126846722"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Home - Designer
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1440245185022{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_custom_heading text="How did STORESY Magazine begin?" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:26px|text_align:left|line_height:36px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Slab%3A100%2C300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][vc_single_image image="74968" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1440263014940{margin-top: 22px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Marie Dier, Editor-in-chief" font_container="tag:p|font_size:13px|text_align:left|color:%23999999|line_height:18px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Slab%3A100%2C300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][vc_separator color="#e2e2e2" thickness="1" down="20"][vc_column_text]

STORESY creates a magazine for creative designers, we want to inspire your imagination with the latest design trends and spark creativity within you.

It was founded by Marie Dier in Berlin in 2005 and continues to the present day, published monthly and enjoyed by thousands of people around the world.

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean beside a small river.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1441119568708{padding-top: 28px !important;padding-right: 28px !important;padding-bottom: 28px !important;padding-left: 28px !important;background-color: #f7edf2 !important;}" el_class="mini-newsletter"]

item.excerpt:encoded: This post is designed in a way as so to test for a large number of nested comments. Click inside and see!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
There are a few checklist items that should be in each comment.
  • The commenter's gravatar. Optional, but a best practice. Use get_comment_author_email.
  • The commenter's name. Use comment_author.
  • The commenter's URL. Usually applied as a link to the commenter's name. Use comment_author_url
  • The date / time the comment was made. Use get_comment_date.
  • A permalink to the comment. Usually applied as a link to the date / time of the comment. Use get_comment_link
  • Indication of a comment left by the post author. Style the .bypostauthor class.
  • The comment text. Use comment_text.
  • An edit comment link. Use edit_comment_link.
  • A comment reply link. Used for threaded comments. Use comment_reply_link.

Headings

Header one

Header two

Header three

Header four

Header five
Header six

Blockquotes

Single line blockquote:
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
Multi line blockquote with a cite reference:
People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. But that's not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully. I'm actually as proud of the things we haven't done as the things I have done. Innovation is saying no to 1,000 things. Steve Jobs - Apple Worldwide Developers' Conference, 1997

Tables

Employee Salary
John Saddington $1 Because that's all Steve Job' needed for a salary.
Tom McFarlin $100K For all the blogging he does.
Jared Erickson $100M Pictures are worth a thousand words, right? So Tom x 1,000.
Chris Ames $100B With hair like that?! Enough said...

Definition Lists

Definition List Title
Definition list division.
Startup
A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.
#dowork
Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.
Do It Live
I'll let Bill O'Reilly will explain this one.

HTML Tags

These supported tags come from the WordPress.com code FAQ. Address Tag
1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, CA 95014 United States
Anchor Tag (aka. Link) This is an example of a link. Abbreviation Tag The abbreviation srsly stands for "seriously". Acronym Tag The acronym ftw stands for "for the win". Big Tag These tests are a big deal, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5. Cite Tag "Code is poetry." --Automattic Code Tag You will learn later on in these tests that word-wrap: break-word; will be your best friend. Delete Tag This tag will let you strikeout text, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5 (use the <strike> instead). Emphasize Tag The emphasize tag should italicize text. Insert Tag This tag should denote inserted text. Keyboard Tag This scarsly known tag emulates keyboard text, which is usually styled like the <code> tag. Preformatted Tag This tag styles large blocks of code. 
.post-title {
	margin: 0 0 5px;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 38px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}
Quote Tag Developers, developers, developers... --Steve Ballmer Strong Tag This tag shows bold text. Subscript Tag Getting our science styling on with H2O, which should push the "2" down. Superscript Tag Still sticking with science and Isaac Newton's E = MC2, which should lift the 2 up. Teletype Tag This rarely used tag emulates teletype text, which is usually styled like the <code> tag. Variable Tag This allows you to denote variables.

This user it trying to be anonymous.
  • They used a fake email, so there should be no Gravatar associated with it.
  • They did not speify a website, so there should be no link to it in the comment.

Comment Depth 05

item.title: Smart leaders are focusing on employee empowerment
item.dc:creator: cpadmin

Perhaps the most common symptom among disengaged employees is their sense of being ‘cogs in the machine’, simply performing perfunctory tasks and unable to take real ownership of their work. As such, companies that want to improve employee engagement may need to rethink their techniques from the bottom up, creating more empowered employees who take an active role within the firm.

item.title: What Karlie Koss has in common with Mary Poppins
item.dc:creator: Tom Harrington
item.content:encoded:
If there's anyone who has mastered the art of a quick change, it's Karlie Kloss: As a Victoria's Secret Angel and one of the most in-demand faces in the fashion industry, the jet-setting supermodel—who turns 23 today—has a career that takes her from photo shoot to commercial set to red carpet. So, have you heard about essence yet? And more importantly: Have you figured out what it is? "Essence is the heart of the Korean skincare routine, and it is a skincare category that was created in Korea," Charlotte Cho, co-founder of Soko Glam, tells us—something you may have gleaned while reading up on the Korean skincare routine. If you've been searching around and looking for the next trend as big as BB cream, your search may end here. "But there's a lot of confusion behind the product," Cho said. So, let's clarify.

Immediate hydration

The easiest way to define essence is first to figure out what it is not. This is not toner, but you wouldn't be blamed for thinking that it is. They've got a similar slip to them. But unlike your drugstore bottle of witch hazel, essences by and large come in beautiful (often glass) bottles that look excellent on your countertop. They are also not meant for cleaning. With higher doses of active ingredients, essence is meant to deliver those deep into the skin after you've gone through the process of cleansing (two or three times, if you're thorough). It's got your hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and other natural extracts for an immediately hydrated and comforted feel, according to Janet Pardo, senior vice president of product development at Clinique, who helped create Clinique's Even Better Essence Lotion. It also balances pH once you've stripped the skin of oils. This is what you add to make you feel like you again.

Use separate products

But at the same time, essence isn't a serum, which comes in a smaller vial at higher concentrations. "There's only so much you can pack into an essence or a watery lotion," Pardo said. That doesn't mean you shouldn't use it. Women in Asian markets have sworn by it for decades, Pardo continues, and now that they're filtering into the American market, technology is only getting better. Though it may be of interest: As essences make their way stateside, some companies have blurred the lines between essences and toners with 'treatment' toners/essences/lotions meant to take care of two steps at once. Korean experts still advise using separate products for optimal results.

item.title: Spread an attitude of gratitude
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded: When you think about the standout people and moments in your life, they can likely be broken down into two distinct categories: those that were reach-for-the-stars, over-the-moon-phenomenal, and those that made you feel so damn small you wished you could kick them in the shin and disappear. Now, keeping your personal examples in mind, which would you like to instill in others? Likely (hopefully!) not the latter. It’s nice to feel good, but it’s even better to make others feel good. In fact, research shows that an attitude of gratitude can improve emotional and physical health, strengthen relationships and make you happier at work. In other words? It’s time to show a little (HR appropriate) love in your workplace.
item.excerpt:encoded: When you think about the standout people and moments in your life, they can likely be broken down into two distinct categories.

item.title: Dolby Presents: Silent, a Short Film
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded: This beautiful animated film was designed to showcase Dolby’s partnership with the picture and sound industries over many decades. The story follows two street performers who dream of bringing their "Picture and Sound Show" to life. When they discover a magical contraption inside an old theatre, they embark on a cinematic adventure of sight and sound to find the audience they always wanted.

item.title: Kristen Stewart Shows Us How to Do Tomboy-Chic Right
item.dc:creator: Astrid Sorensen
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Stand out from the crowd!
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
Job fairs are a great way to meet potential employers face-to-face, so it is important to approach them with a plan to make your experience successful. I have attended many job fairs as an employer, so in this post I will offer you four career fair tips based on what the job fair attendees I have hired did.

Do Your Homework & Be Prepared

Read up on what employers will be at the job fair. Most job fair organizers provide a list of scheduled employers on their event website. Research the companies online, and determine which openings you are interested in. Have copies of your resume that speak to your qualifications for these positions. When you get to the job fair, visit these employers’ tables. It is a good idea to walk around to make sure you did not miss any possible job opportunities, but making your top employers your priority will save you the time of visiting lots of tables that do not have openings for your skill set.

Dress the Part

I have been surprised by how many people show up to job fairs in flip flops, sweat pants, dirty T-shirts or crop tops. Treat a job fair like you would an interview. Dress appropriately for the jobs you are looking for. Appropriate attire may include a suit, button-down shirt or skirt. Putting extra effort into your appearance will make you stand out.

Mind Your Manners

At a job fair I recently attended for my last employer, I met a job seeker who interrupted our conversation by answering a call on his cell phone. Needless to say, I did not consider this person for a job. Your phone should be off or on silent and tucked away in a bag or pocket. If you think you might be tempted to check it while meeting potential employers, leave it in your car.

Also remember to be polite and present yourself well. I have attended a number of job fairs in search of candidates for retail customer service jobs. I have had candidates approach my table with a frown on their face, failing to make eye contact and saying, “So, what is this company? What in the world do you do?”
item.excerpt:encoded: Job fairs are a great way to meet potential employers face-to-face, so it is important to approach them with a plan.
